dcterms:description: ISIC-2019 is an imbalanced dataset comprising 25,331 RGB images, each belonging to one of eight skin disease conditions. The dataset is divided into training, validation, and test sets, with label noise injected only into the training set.
dcterms:title: ISIC-2019

dcterms:creator: J. N. Kather

D. Ferber
dcterms:description: Long-tailed NCT-CRC-HE-100K is a long-tailed dataset created from the original NCT-CRC-HE-100K, containing 100,000 histopathology images for training and 7,180 for testing, with nine classes. The dataset was modified to create an imbalanced version using the Pareto distribution.
dcterms:title: Long-tailed NCT-CRC-HE-100K
